  __pyx_v_dims = (__pyx_v_density->dimensions[0]);

 459:         # $: grid point, X: particle position
 460:         # $.........$..X......$
 461:         # ------------>         dist    (1.3)
 462:         # --------->            index_d (1)
 463:         # --------------------> index_u (2)
 464:         #           --->        u       (0.3)
 465:         #              -------> d       (0.7)
+466:         for axis in xrange(3):

      __pyx_v_axis = __pyx_t_3;

      __pyx_v_dist = ((*__Pyx_BufPtrStrided2d(__pyx_t_5numpy_float32_t *, __pyx_pybuffernd_pos.rcbuffer->pybuffer.buf, __pyx_t_4, __pyx_pybuffernd_pos.diminfo[0].strides, __pyx_t_5, __pyx_pybuffernd_pos.diminfo[1].strides)) * __pyx_v_inv_cell_size);

+468:             u[axis]       = dist - <int>dist
      (__pyx_v_u[__pyx_v_axis]) = (__pyx_v_dist - ((int)__pyx_v_dist));

+469:             d[axis]       = 1.0 - u[axis]
      (__pyx_v_d[__pyx_v_axis]) = (1.0 - (__pyx_v_u[__pyx_v_axis]));

+470:             index_d[axis] = (<int>dist)%dims
      (__pyx_v_index_d[__pyx_v_axis]) = (((int)__pyx_v_dist) % __pyx_v_dims);

+471:             index_u[axis] = index_d[axis] + 1
      (__pyx_v_index_u[__pyx_v_axis]) = ((__pyx_v_index_d[__pyx_v_axis]) + 1);

+472:             index_u[axis] = index_u[axis]%dims #seems this is faster
      (__pyx_v_index_u[__pyx_v_axis]) = ((__pyx_v_index_u[__pyx_v_axis]) % __pyx_v_dims);
    }
